name: es-checker
description: A feature detection library for ECMAScript in node.js and browser

scripts.build: browserify public/assets/origin.js -o es-checker.js && cp -f es-checker.js public && browserify public/assets/mapper.origin.js -o public/assets/mapper.js && cp -rf public dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run pages && rm -rf dist

author: Ruan Yifeng
